participant_1.background:
I go to nature documentaries to feel like I'm experiencing nature without being limited by my disability.
I went hiking and swimming last time I was on vacation.
i graduated with a business degree , and marketing is all that i really enjoyed.
i do not like acting.

participant_2.background:
I live on a farm with my mom who works in telecommunications.
i am a musician.
i have a marketing job.
My favorite music is techno, it helps me get in the zone for my workouts.
i am funny.

content.text: Hi there! How is your day going?
It's going well! I just got back from hiking.
That sounds fun! I love hiking, where did you go?
I went to a local park, it's not too far from my house.
I'm jealous, I've been wanting to go hiking but I don't have anyone to go with me.
Oh, that's a bummer. Maybe we could go together sometime?
That would be great! I love meeting new people.
Me too! I'm sure we'd have a lot in common.
I bet we would! I'm a musician and I also have a marketing job.
Oh, that's cool! I'm a musician too, but I don't have a marketing job.
Well, maybe we could work together on something sometime.
That would be awesome! I'd love to collaborate with you.
Great! I'll send you my contact info.
Awesome! I'll add you on social media and we can chat more there.
